1113121.content:
Sabrina was on her last high school day. Before then, she had become rather depressed. She still never got a boyfriend, despite her attraction to a boy named Harvey, only for him to not be "romantically interested". It was there, at the high school she had been going to, and at this point for the last time, that she tried a pancake for the first time in her life. She caught herself rather addicted from there. She was curious about what they were like, despite her aunts telling her that her family's line had an addiction to pancakes, be they just those or "conjured" ones, and "conjured chocolaty foods", other such kinds of "conjured" foods, in general, and decided to try one of these pancakes. She at least managed to bide her time 'til her last high school day was over. It was over for twelfth graders, including herself, during the first half of usual high school days. However, while in her own car she earned with insurance to cover it through arrangements made by her aunts upon her driver's education being completed, her driver's test passed and her driver's license won; which she was in for the purpose of heading for an afternoon, evening and possibly early night around the town she had been living with her aunts in, she dropped by at a buffet restaurant for lunch. A rather diverse and breakfast and lunch and dinner all-you-can-eat type of buffet. When she got there, she got her car into her parking lot, she entered the place and said it was just her at either a table or booth. A booth was offered, which she took. When this was done, she went to see what the buffet trays and plates, etc., had to offer and they offered diverse types of foods. Even pancakes, still. She got lots of customer's trays with plates of pancakes for her booth along with some syrup to go with those. She got straight to them, taking care she use a fork, a knife and some paper napkins to keep her fingers, hands, mouth and lips clean and a towel napkin to protect her regular grey colored shirt she was wearing with her blue-colored jeans long pants. She placed syrup on lots of the plates, fortunately not enough to make messes anywhere but still a lot. She ate lots of them. However, though the time of her arrival at this place was 10:50 AM, it only took up until 12:45 PM for her to finish those. When she did, she noticed some changes on her body. Most especially the middle of her front. Her belly of a stomach was getting really big, and though it caught her off guard, she now didn't care. Even so, though, she was starting to feel really full.

Plus, not only did it catch her off guard that she had a rather "chubby", big, distended, fat and round belly, but it also caused her to have a small but still hearty hiccup.

She was mortified by this, and proceeded to cover her mouth.

Sabrina realized she was beginning to gain weight.

Yet a part of her did not CARE anymore. Since the start of her depressed state she still had been in.

She was not sure whether she should just pay her bill and be off to continue her "afternoon and evening and early night on the town".

Though she was starting to feel full and saw that she had put on a lot of weight, she was craving for more pancakes and even other foods like the kinds available at the all-you-can-eat-buffet restaurant she stopped by at for lunch offered.

The bill was an inexpensive one to pay, fortunately.

Though Sabrina was unsure of whether she should just pay and take her leave to avoid getting any "unwanted attention", she didn't care and was too addicted to care at this point.
1113121.title: Sabrina's Last High School Day & Day of Depression

12.content: Characters of Sabrina's College life
12.title: College

121.content:
Sabrina Spellman is loving her new college lifestyle, and is living it large!

But will this witch be able to avoid the fabled freshmen fifteen?
121.title: Sabrina

1211.content:
Adams College, Boston, prided itself on providing a well-rounded education, in terms of academics, sport, and extracurricular activities. Little did some students realize just how 'well-rounding' it could become.

Sabrina Spellman, for instance, when picking her classes and physical activities, never even considered the idea that they could result in her gaining weight. But a combination of late-night study (and snacking) sessions, plenty of junk food and beer, and a relatively easy-going yoga class, meant that she was suddenly starting to outgrow her outfits. At first, she attributed it to the laundry service shrinking her clothes, but one day, she was forced to come to terms with her, 'growth'.

***
It was a Saturday, the morning after an evening of eating and watching bad TV. Sabrina was still in bed, but her roommate, Roxie King, was up and sitting on the couch, brushing her long black hair. She was pretty slim, with small, yet perky boobs, though a slight potbelly was visible under her long-sleeved grey blouse, a result of her addiction to takeout food, which she had been indulging a little too often lately.

She was just considering getting some breakfast when Sabrina emerged from their shared room, dressed only in a t-shirt and panties.

Roxie's eyes widened as she looked at her friend.

"Whoa..."

Sabrina looked up, scratching her head.

"What?"

What was so shocking to Roxie was that Sabrina had clearly put on quite a bit of weight, probably around 15 pounds, and on her small frame, it really showed. The blonde's once flat stomach had grown into a proper belly, sticking out from under her nightshirt and jiggling when she walked. As she bent down to turn on the TV, she revealed that her weight gain hadn't been limited to her stomach, her wide bottom testing the limits of her underwear, the crack of her butt cheeks just peeking out above the straining waistband

By the time Roxie had gathered her thoughts, Sabrina was already sitting on the couch, helping herself to some leftover Chinese food.

"So," Sabrina began, chewing on a spring roll, "What's up?"

Roxie hesitated. Despite her reputation as a bit of a bitch, it was a delicate subject, and she was aware that she had put on a little weight as well recently. Still, she had to say something.

"It's just..."

Luckily, Roxie was spared this unpleasant job by the return of their other roommate, Morgan, from her daily jog.

A red-headed, air-headed fashionista, with a cute face and bubbly curves, Morgan Cavanagh took great pride in her personal appearance, and made a point of exercising every day. While she generally watched what she ate, she also had quite a sweet-tooth, and often picked up pastries and other sweets to share.

She walked in through the door, resplendent in a hot pink tracksuit with matching running shoes, a Walkman clipped to her belt.

"I brought donuts!" she trilled, brandishing a brown paper bag.

Both Sabrina and Roxie were enticed by this news, and quickly abandoned the couch and moved to the kitchen area. Soon, all three girls were tucking into the sugary treats, as well as three steaming cups of coffee. They soon finished off the entire dozen (Roxie had three, Morgan helped herself to four, while Sabrina managed to pack away five), and sat back, satisfied.

Sabrina stood up to get another cup of coffee, giving Morgan a great view of her expanded form.

She gasped and turned to Roxie, who gave her a warning look.

“Wow Sabrina,” Morgan began, “you’ve put on so much…

“…Coffee!” Roxie interrupted, “Morgan was just saying you’ve put on so much coffee, I don’t know how we can drink it all! Right, Morgan?” she added, threateningly.

Morgan looked confused. “Oh, yeah. Coffee…”

Roxie sighed in relief.
as Sabrina sat back down.“Also,” Morgan continued, “you really got fat.”

Roxie groaned.

***

Sabrina stormed into her room, slamming the door behind her. She couldn’t believe the nerve of Morgan! Calling her fat! For a moment, she’d thought it was just her usually superficiality, until she saw Roxie nodding her head. Maybe she had put on a little weight, but…

Feeling nervous, she conjured up a full-length mirror and took a good look at herself. She lifted up her shirt and poked her stomach. It looked rounder…

“I’m just a little bloated…” she told herself, “from the donuts.”

She ran her hands up over her breasts, which felt a little fuller. In fact, she had noticed her bras were getting kind of snug…

“It’s just… a growth spurt?”

She turned around, and looking over her shoulder, surveyed her backside. It stuck out much more than it used too, and the fabric of her underwear was being drawn up between her butt cheeks, giving it a thong-like appearance.

“It’s just because I’m… getting fat.” She moaned, finally realizing how much weight she’d put on. It wasn’t her fault, she thought, sitting down on the bed and rubbing her belly. It was hard for her to keep slim when you could conjure up food at the point of a finger, especially without her aunts to keep an eye on her.

With that in mind, Sabrina decided to go ...
1211.title: The Spellman Sixteen

choices: Make it so being fat is attractive.
12111.content:
Her aunts! That was the answer. They would be able to give her advice, maybe there was even a spell to help her shed a few pounds...

With a point of her finger, she disappeared in a shower of golden sparkles, just as Roxy opened the bedroom door.

"Hey Sabrina, I..." The dark haired girl broke off as she realised the room was empty. "What the?" She asked, looking around in amazement.

Morgan poked her head in the door. "Maybe she went out the window." She said, naively.

Roxy glanced at the window, measuring it up. "I don't think she would fit..."


***

With a second shower of golden sparkles, Sabrina appeared in her old bedroom, the familiar surroundings easing her mind. She stretched and yawned, only to hear a all too familiar voice from behind her.

"Whoa! Full moon on the horizon!" Salem smirked, as Sabrina's shirt rose up over her bigger butt.

"Salem!" She cried, turning around and pulling her shirt down. "What are you doing in my room?"

Salem stood up and made for door. "I was just trying to make the best of it before Hilda and Zelda turn it into a workout room. Speaking of working out..."

Sabrina grabbed a pillow and threw it at the cat, who let out a hiss before darting away. She then decided to get dressed, finding an old pair of track pants that looked like they would fit. She pulled them on, and they were fine, if a little snug around her rear.

She made her way down stairs, to find her aunts in the kitchen. Zelda was sorting through some post while Hilda was buttering a slice of toast. They both turned to look at her as she came downstairs, their faces lighting up.

"Sabrina!" They said in unison, as she sat down at the table. "And how's our favourite niece doing today?" Zelda asked.

"Uh, I'm okay." She murmured, reaching for a slice of toast and some jelly. What was the best way to bring this up?

"Um, Aunt Zelda, when you went to college, did you ever find you had any trouble with... um..."

Zelda smiled. "Let me guess, you've put on a few pounds, and you're feeling self-conscious."

Sabrina sighed with relief, but stood up to show them the extent of the damage. "It's more than a few pounds."

Hilda whistled. "Still, don't worry about it Sabrina. I remember when Zelda came home from her first year of college, and she..."

Zelda interrupted primly. "Now, you have to remember it was attractive to be a little heavy back then."

"A little heavy? You were the only woman who could make Henry the Eight look skinny!" Hilda laughed, as Zelda scowled.

Sabrina looked at her rail thin aunt. "Really? How did you lose it?"

Zelda smiled. "Hard work and discipline, honey. There's no quick fix I'm afraid."

Sabrina frowned, but at least they understood what she was going through. "Thanks guys, I'm going to head upstairs and grab a few more things with elastic waistbands, at least for now."

She walked back upstairs, panting a little as she reached the top, and re-entered her room. Salem was on her bed again, leafing through a telephone directory.

"Good news Sabrina, I found a contractor who can reinforce your bed for you!" He said, grinning.

"Oh ha ha," She laughed, as she went back to her closet. "Why don't you look up taxidermists?"

"Or, you could just look up a spell to get rid of the extra weight?" He suggested.

"Aunt Zelda said there wasn't a spell that could do that." Sabrina said, turning around, intrigued.

"Not exactly, but there are ways around that. You could transfer the weight to someone else, or somewhere else in your body."

Sabrina thought back to what Zelda had said earlier. "Could I just change it so its attractive to be fat?"

"I guess." Salem replied. "So what are you going to do?
12111.title: ...visit her aunts.

choices: The spell works, and the world's transformed
121112.content:
"So, you want to be fat and considered attractive?" Salem shrugged, sounding not very surprised (but then it would take a lot to surprise him), but rather sarcastic. "No problem, you've just got to use 'Beauty in the eye of the Beholder' spell."

"Really? And where is it?" Sabrina said, eagerly.

"Here," Salem trotted over to Sabrina's old desk drawer. "Remember your old big book of magic? It's in there."

"Let me see," Sabrina said eagerly, as she opened the drawer and withdrew her spellbook. "Hmm, beholder, beholder..."

"Try beauty," Salem suggested brightly.

"Oh, good point! Here it is!" Sabrina said eagerly, and cast the spell.
121112.title: Make it so being fat is attractive.

12112.content:
"Alright," Sabrina said to herself. "This flab has got to go!" She stood up and walked over to her closet. She changed into some sweat pants and a loose tee and walked out of her room.
"Where're you going?" asked Roxie, curious.
"I'm going out for a jog. I'll be back later!" With that, Sabrina walked out the front door and started out on her jog.

Sabrina didn't want any of the guys at her college to see her, so she decided to go to the park instead. She rode her car there, as she didn't want to use up any energy walking or running there. Once at the park, she got out of her car and got on the sidewalk. She didn't think that she would need to stretch first, so she just started out on her jog.

The jog was more challenging than she had originally thought that it would be. Her boobs kept bouncing up and down as she ran along, almost smacking her in the face. Her butt was slowing her down, too, as it was jiggling like mad with every step. This was also true for her thighs and stomach. "Okay." Sabrina panted after five minutes of jogging. "I need something to keep these things down with." She went behind a tree near the path and conjured two roes. She used one to tie up her boobs and the other to tie up her butt. She ran on like that, but she was still lazy, fat, and out of breath, so these changes didn't help out very much. And she couldn't tie down her stomach without hurting herself, so she had to just let it jiggle.

After thirty minutes of jogging, Sabrina felt ready to pass out. She walked back to her car, and once she was inside of it, the first thing she did was conjur up an liter of Coca-Cola. She chugged the whole thing in one breath. When she had finished her drink, she let out a large belch. "Excuse me!" she said. "Wow... That was worse than anything I've ever done before! I'm hungry now..." She looked around the outside of the car to make sure that nobody was watching, and then conjured up an entire fast food meal.

The meal that Sabrina had conjured was a supersized order. She had a triple stack bacon and cheese burger, fries, another Coke, and a large chocolate milkshake. The meal was highly fattening, but Sabrina didn't care. She just wanted something to eat right now. She downed the entire meal in five minutes flat. Her stomach bloated, she felt content. The meal that Sabrina had eaten had canceled out the jog and then some. She had gained weight after her little jog.

"Urrgh... I'm so full, but I'm still hungry!" said Sabrina. She decided to...
12112.title: ...out for a jog.

121122.content:
By the time Sabrina returned home, she felt hungry once more, and also tired - she got unused to exercise of any sort, and it showed. Her face was red and flushed, she was sweaty all over, and her hair was hanging in limp, greasy ropes down her now-wider back. In short, Sabrina needed a shower, for she smelled as well.

And Morgan was the one to tell her that. "Wow, Sabrina, you really need to take a shower - and lose that weight," the tactless redhead told her promptly.

Sabrina's eyebrow twitched, and a tiny spark of magic almost leaped off her onto Morgan - she was barely able to restrain herself. Instead, she just tried to reach the shower ASAP. Sadly, as she had almost reached her destination, Roxy decided to join Morgan, albeit in a more helpful way.

"Um, Sabrina? I may not be the most social person and all, but I agree that you could use some help in getting back into shape. Plus, if you sweat a lot and take over the shower-"

Almost growling in irritation, Sabrina slammed the bathroom's door, accidentally releasing some of her magic and hitting the other two girls before they could realize what has happened.

...As Sabrina closed the door into the bathroom in order to bathe, Roxy and Morgan looked at each other in a weird manner.

"I'm off to cook Sabrina a big meal," Morgan said promptly and walked off to the kitchenette, while Roxy looked at the bathroom door.

"And I'm off to help Sabrina bathe - before taking over the chores," the brunette said quietly.

...Not knowing just what has happened back in the living room, Sabrina began to sing in the shower.
121122.title: Go home.

12113.content:
"Hey, you know what?" said Sabrina to herself. "If I want to lose weight, all I have to do is use my magic! That being said, all I have to do when I'm hungry is the same thing. In fact..." With that, Sabrina conjured up a large chocolate cake for herself. It was the size of a wedding cake, and the place where the figurines would go on top was replaced with two Twix bars. She ate the entire cake in five minutes flat. When she finished, she knew that she was bigger. Only a small bit, and it was barely noticeable. Her butt was a little bit bigger in her panties, her breasts were starting to strain her bra slightly, and her belly was ever so slightly bigger.

"Perfect as always!" said Sabrina, licking her fingers. "I'm still hungry, though. It wouldn't hurt too much if I conjured up just one more cake like that!" So she conjured another. She ate it and was still hungry, so she conjured up another. And then another. And then another. She had already downed five cakes, and it was now starting to become quite obvious. She kept eating and didn't care because of a slight problem with conjured chocolate.

Wizards and witches have near unlimited powers, but there are a few glitches in the magical system. Conjured chocolate was one of these glitches. The chocolate that wizards and witches could conjure would look and taste just like regular chocolate items, but they were quite addicting and more fattening. A witch could become addicted after just one bite of a conjured chocolate bar or cake. And Sabrina was officially hooked.

Sabrina had downed nine cakes so far and was working on her tenth when problems started to occur for her. The first thing that happened was that her stomach started sticking out of the bottom of her shirt. She didn't notice this until her whole naval was sticking out. She tried fixing it, but it didn't go well. She would fix it temporarily and then just come back out. The next thing that happened was that her panties started to ride right up her butt. She would fix it, but just as her stomach did with her shirt, her panties just kept on going back in. She eventually gave up on that. The last problem that she noticed was that her bra was starting to become insanely tight. She hadn't bought any new bras since her weight gain, as she had been in denial up into this moment. It was starting to cut into the fat on her back, and the fat collecting in her breasts were starting to seep over the edges of the bra.

Sabrina had finished the tenth cake and had taken three bites of the eleventh cake when she heard a rip. She looked behind her and down, and saw that the rip had been caused by her panties. Her butt had expanded to past the limit of them, and a tear had started to rip through the bottom part that would have normally been covering the bottom of her butt. "Uh oh... That's not good!" She said through another bite of cake. "I should probably get some new panties on, but I really don't want this cake to go to waste. Well, I'll put on some new panties when I'm done!" With that, she continued eating. After she was half way done with the eleventh cake, her panties completely ripped off, revealing her large rear end. "Oh, crap! I really should put on some more panties now. But..." she looked over at the cake, longingly. "This cake really doesn't need to just sit out here. So she finished the cake.

After she had taken the last bite of the eleventh cake, her bra popped off. She was now completely naked and totally fat. Her butt was the size of two small pillows, her boobs were both the size of two basket balls, and her belly was as big as a small yoga ball. She looked down and saw all of this new fat, and decided that she needed to put some clothes on. "But I'm still so hungry!" she said to herself. "Maybe I should conjure up just one more before putting on some more underwear..."
12113.title: Conjures food.

Her belly was also now so big, bloated, swollen, "porked", "plumped", distended, heavy and fat that it made her look like a humanoid whale pregnant with forty kids at the point of nine months plus ten, eleven, twelve months and four hundred and forty weeks overdue with them while in human form. She looked down and saw all of this new fat, and decided that she needed someone to help her. "But I'm still so hungry!" she said to herself. "Maybe I should conjure up just one more serving of all I've eaten and maybe depending on how hungry I feel bring up two hundred and eighty times as much before calling for someone to help me up." And so ...

1212.content: For the last few months since her start at university at Bosfkn, at a house her aunts had enough resources to make investments into so that even though they'd be the actual owners, Sabrina could use it as an extra residence, as Sabrina also managed to make a book repair client business through the usage of which she used a book repair kit, Sabrina had been residing at that place. Though she had "non-conjured food" at her home from "fridge and freezer type" to closet type and "non-junk food and junk food type" alike, partly due to the degree she chose-despite it being an associate degree-had enough stress that despite no more than three classes, they and her client business were enough stress for her to "conjure" food of primarily "junk food type" and have "order for delivery" types in excess from "pizza" to "order on the way", usually in enough excess that at this point, she was not necessarily "fat" or "obese" but was not as "skinny" or "thin" as she used to be before university started for her. Her first university year started at that point since the start of September but at one point at a "Pre-Halloween" party, someone apologized for not recognizing her at first. Though she accepted it, confirming she was not offended. However, she was annoyed, sending with her "capabilities" that it was due to her recent "weight gain". She was not "fat" or obese by then, but she was still "not as skinny as she used to be", nonetheless. At this point, it was a Friday morning of "Haloween", for which-due to the "kid numbers" in the "suburb area" her residential place was-she gathered enough candy to give to these kids but had some excessive amounts due to her stress. She was lying on her couch which had in front of it a coffee table that she could place her feet on, due to not having assignments due to having them finished before this point. She had been eating that while sitting on her couch, with her legs on that very table spoken of earlier. Because of this, her weight was increasing-especially in her stomach. It was since 4:30 am at this point when she was doing it due to growing accustomed to being awake by then, and that was all she was basically doing at this point. Sabrina, noticing her stomach, then did realize her increasing weight gain, after finishing her eating session at that point. But as for what she chose to do ...
